examples.example: 尽管遇到了很多困难，但他始终不愿意放弃自己的梦想。

translate.english: Although encountering many difficulties, he still does not want to give up his dream.

examples.example: 她不愿意浪费每一分宝贵的时间，努力地去追求自己的目标。

translate.english: She is not willing to waste every precious minute and strives to pursue her goals.

examples.example: 他不愿意错过任何一个提升自己的机会，总是积极进取。

translate.english: He is not willing to miss any opportunity to improve himself and is always aggressive.
